mapper.insert: insert into nantong_changjiang_box_environment (info_id,area_name,area_id,spot_id,node_id,data_time,G_InVoltage,G_InCurrent, G_Temperature, Z_InVoltage,Z_InCurrent,Z_Temperature, Z_JueYuan,Z_LouShui, C_InVoltage, C_YunTaiDianLiu,C_Temperature,C_JueYuan, C_LouShui,Water_Deep) value( #{infoId},#{areaName},#{areaId},#{spotId},#{nodeId},#{dataTime},#{gInVoltage}, #{gInCurrent},#{gTemperature},#{zInVoltage}, #{zInCurrent},#{zTemperature},#{zJueYuan}, #{zLouShui},#{cInVoltage},#{cYunTaiDianLiu}, #{cTemperature},#{cJueYuan},#{cLouShui},#{waterDeep} )
mapper.update: update nantong_changjiang_box_environment set G_InVoltage = #{gInVoltage}, G_InCurrent = #{gInCurrent}, G_Temperature = #{gTemperature}, Z_InVoltage = #{zInVoltage}, Z_InCurrent = #{zInCurrent}, Z_Temperature = #{zTemperature}, Z_JueYuan = #{zJueYuan}, Z_LouShui = #{zLouShui}, C_InVoltage = #{cInVoltage}, C_YunTaiDianLiu = #{cYunTaiDianLiu}, C_Temperature = #{cTemperature}, C_JueYuan = #{cJueYuan}, C_LouShui = #{cLouShui}, Water_Deep = #{waterDeep}
mapper.delete: delete from nantong_changjiang_box_environment where info_id = #{infoId} and area_name = #{areaName}
mapper.select: select G_InVoltage,G_InCurrent, G_Temperature , Z_InVoltage,Z_InCurrent,Z_Temperature, Z_JueYuan,Z_LouShui,C_InVoltage, C_YunTaiDianLiu,C_Temperature,C_JueYuan,C_LouShui,Water_Deep from nantong_changjiang_box_environment where area_id = #{areaId} and spot_id = #{spotId} and node_id = #{nodeId} and data_time = #{dataTime}
